import React from 'react'; import { startLoging } from '../../actions/auth'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useForm } from '../../hook/useForm' import './login.css'; export const LoginScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [formLoginValues, handleLoginInputChange] = useForm({ lEmail: 'fabbry23@gmail.com', lPassword: '123456' }); const [formRegisterValues, handleRegisterInputChange] = useForm({ rName: 'Cacho', rEmail: 'cachudo@gmail.com', rPassword1: '123456', rPassword2: '123456' }); const { lEmail, lPassword } = formLoginValues; const { rEmail, rPassword1, rPassword2, rName } = formRegisterValues; const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(startLoging(lEmail, lPassword)); } return (

Ingreso
